channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Attacks on ICE Must Stop
item.description: The latest attack on an agency facility in Dallas is not an isolated incident.

item.title: Obama says he has been 'digging myself out of' hole with Michelle
item.description: President Barack Obama admits he has been digging himself out of a hole in his relationship with Michelle Obama during his European speaking tour.

item.title: Trump Is Right. Christians Are Threatened Across the Globe
item.description: Christians are being punished and persecuted simply for living out their beliefs — and all of society loses out as a result. But none of this is inevi...

item.title: The American Left Is Resurrecting The Bloody Legacy Of John Brown
item.description: We should take the left’s invocation of John Brown seriously. It’s a call to murder anyone who opposes their agenda.

item.title: Trump admin's crackdown on illicit Chinese vapes in US scores major wins: 'Emerging threat'
item.description: The Trump administration has made progress in recent months cracking down on illicit Chinese vapes but industry insiders say there is still much more ...

item.title: Exclusive: Touring Capital, founded by ex-M12 and SoftBank investors, closes $330 million first fund
item.description: Founded in 2023, Touring Capital has now closed its first fund at $330 million, Fortune has exclusively learned.

item.title: 'Very talented': Harris reveals Jasmine Crockett was part of 'secret project' of lawmakers she was mentoring
item.description: In her memoir, former Vice President Kamala Harris describes privately mentoring Rep. Jasmine Crockett and other Democrats through a West Wing initiat...

item.title: Can Erika Kirk’s Influence Help Women To ‘Woman Up?’
item.description: As Erika Kirk takes the helm at Turning Point, many have suggested she could do for young women what her husband has done for young men.

item.title: Visiting a New University in Austin, Texas
item.description: Places like the University of Austin, driven by the Great Books, merit, and free inquiry, are part of the mix in changing higher ed’s tune.

item.title: Trump ally Ben Carson sworn in as national advisor for nutrition, health, and housing with USDA
item.description: Former neurosurgeon Dr. Ben Carson was sworn in to serve as national advisor for nutrition, health and housing with the Department of Agriculture.

item.title: Take It from Albuquerque: Free Transit Is a Bad Idea
item.description: Zohran Mamdani should get the hint and scrap his proposal for New York City.

item.title: Apple admits some of its in-store chargers are scuffing the new iPhone 17 Pro, adding fuel to users’ durability concerns
item.description: Apple went for aluminum over titanium for this year's "Pro" iPhones, and this appears to be one of the trade-offs.

item.title: Mangione, Catholic Church shooter, Charlie Kirk shooter, ICE shooter all used engraved bullets
item.description: FBI Director Kash Patel reveals anti-ICE messages on bullet casings from Dallas shooting, part of a growing trend of suspects signaling motives throug...

item.title: There’s Too Much of Everything
item.description: The deluge of entertainment and information in our era is diluting our enjoyment.

item.title: China’s top car exporter Chery gains in Hong Kong debut
item.description: Chery has remained China’s top exporting brand every year since 2003. Russia, the Middle East and South America are among its top overseas sales marke...

item.title: Everyone agrees stocks are suspiciously high. And everyone agrees they’re going higher anyway
item.description: The party is likely to continue despite the fact that the U.S. stock markets are dependent on the fate of just seven—or maybe even just one—company.

item.title: Vance Slams Democrats, Media For ‘Encouraging Crazy People’ To ‘Commit Violence’
item.description: 'Political violence has gotten out of control in this country. We've got to stop it. We've got to condemn it. And that starts, unfortunately, at the v...

item.title: Media, Dems Won’t Apologize For Comparing ICE To Gestapo After Attack Targeting Agents
item.description: Democrats declined to apologize for comparing ICE to the Gestapo in the wake of a deadly attack on an ICE facility in Texas.

item.title: White House tells agencies to draft mass firing plans ahead of potential shutdown
item.description: The White House is telling agencies to prepare large-scale firings of federal workers if the government shuts down next week.

item.title: Here’s Proof Democrats Are Lying About Protecting Jimmy Kimmel Over ‘Free Speech’
item.description: Democrats have exactly zero credibility to stand on when attacking Chairman Carr for supposedly politicizing the FCC.

item.title: Bessent says New York can ‘drop dead’ if it elects Mamdani and ever needs a bailout
item.description: Bessent seemed determined to drive his warning home: "You can't enact policies like this and expect to be bailed out."

item.title: Justice Department trying to indict former FBI Director Comey by next week
item.description: Federal prosecutors are trying to indict former FBI Director James B. Comey before the statute of limitations runs out next week for perjury charges.
